name: Epsom ECM
overview:
Let me increase your cashflow allowing you to grow your business. Why employ in house when you can use the more experienced and knowledegable services of Epsom Credit Management. With over 13 years experience results are guaranteed for less cost, therefore saving you time and money on the hiring, salary and running costs of your credit control department along with having your clients pay you on time.

Epsom Credit Management can help by undertaking complete control of your credit management or working on a part time basis optimising your cash flow - whether its on going debt recovery or just a one off problematic account.

Specialising in national and international debt chasing, credit control, cash collections, risk assessment, credit checking, bespoke credit management training and legal proceedings no debt is too large or too small.

Epsom Credit Management has previously traded as Amendia Financial Solutions Ltd and has been est. since 2007.
